name: Laura
description:
Laura is a surreal rpg horror game about a doll who becomes estranged from her owner and must find her way back after falling into the land of lost toys.

THIS IS A PROTOTYPE!

It is very short too! There is currently no ending to the game, so you'll probably just wander aimlessly.

FUTURE FEATURES:
  • 5+ Hours of Gameplay
  • Original artwork and stories.
  • Disturbing content 
  • A surreal world to explore and fight in.
  • Multiple endings
  • Characters that are cute, disturbing, and dangerous.
  • and much more!

If you want to support development, please consider donating to my Ko-Fi!

Follow dev on here or on tumblr!

Comments? Suggestions? Bugs? Email dreamcutegame@gmai.com , comment below or message me on tumblr
